data.text: @KFLAPH How do we determine risk with no information about prevalence of the virus in the community? Wastewater signal is up, suggesting more illness in the community. We are left on our own to make decisions without information on which to base decisions. Rock and hard place?

@KFLAPH The KFLA website still shows that we are in the red zone corresponding to maximum Covid risk, just like over Christmas and New Years. But this kind of alarmist messaging does not seem helpful at this stage.
@ManxGirl62 @KFLAPH Probably from an employee because even though patrons had to be vaxxed employees did not.
@KFLAPH Won't be going anywhere that isn't asking for vaccine proof. I value my 4 year olds life too much.
@KFLAPH How about "will the chain of covid infections from my case lead directly to the next unnecessary covid death?"

@KFLAPH Went out to a restaurant for my Birthday last month. First time in a restaurant in 2 years and I ended up with a side order of covid. Thankful that it wasn’t too bad. You just don’t know. I’ve done everything right and ended up with a mild case.
